REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0109 reute h f BC-<BARTER-RESOURCES>-FO 03-09 0060

TEXT.TITLE: <BARTER RESOURCES> FORMS HOME SHOPPING UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Barter Resources said it formed a television home shopping unit, Television Catalogue Inc. The company said an investor group paid 500,000 dlrs in funding for a 51 pct interest in the unit. Barter said 100,000 dlrs of the funding has been paid, with the balance due within sixty days. Reuter
